br.uff.midiacom.ana.interfaces
Class NCLProperty<I extends NCLInterface>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLIdentifiableElement
              br.uff.midiacom.ana.interfaces.NCLProperty<I>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, IdentifiableElement, NCLInterface<I>, java.lang.Comparable<I>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLProperty<I extends NCLInterface>
extends NCLIdentifiableElement
implements NCLInterface<I>

Esta classe define o elemento property da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define uma propriedade de um nó.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
